text: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ

translation.en.sahih: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the destination.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan kepunyaan Allah-lah kerajaan langit dan bumi dan kepada Allah-lah kembali (semua makhluk).
